org.lightsleep.component

Interface Condition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SqlComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    And, EntityCondition, Expression, LogicalCondition, Not, Or, OrderBy.Element, SubqueryCondition

    public interface Condition
extends SqlComponent
    A interface of condition for SQL.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Masato Kokubo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Condition ALL
      The condition for all rows
      static Condition EMPTY
      The empty condition

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Condition and(java.util.Collection<Condition> conditions)
      Returns new And(conditions).optimized().
      static Condition and(Condition... conditions)
      Returns an optimized new And(conditions).
      default Condition and(Condition condition)
      Returns an optimized (this AND condition).
      default <K> Condition and(K entity)
      Returns an optimized (this AND the entity condition).
      default <E,SE> Condition and(Sql<E> outerSql, Sql<SE> subSql, java.lang.String content)
      Returns an optimized (this AND the subquery condition).

      Returns an optimized new And(conditions).
      default Condition and(java.lang.String content, java.lang.Object... arguments)
      Returns an optimized (this AND the expression condition).
      default <E,SE> Condition and(java.lang.String content, Sql<E> outerSql, Sql<SE> subSql)
      Returns an optimized (this AND the subquery condition).
      default Condition not()
      Returns an optimized (NOT this).

      Returns a new entity condition.

      • of

        static <E,SE> Condition of(java.lang.String content,
                           Sql<E> outerSql,
                           Sql<SE> subSql)
        Returns a new subquery condition.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of the entity related to table of the outer sql.
        SE - the type of the entity related to table of the subquery.
        Parameters:
        content - the content of the subquery condition.
        outerSql - the Sql object syntactically outer of subSql
        subSql - the Sql of the subquery condition.
        Returns:
        a new subquery condition
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if content, outerSql or subSql is null
        See Also:
        of(Sql, Sql, String), SubqueryCondition(Expression, Sql, Sql)
